events.title: SheLeads Tech
events.description: SheLeads Tech is a hackathon focused on empowering women in technology. Participants will collaborate to develop innovative solutions, network with industry leaders, and showcase their skills.

events.title: SheInnovates
events.description: SheInnovates is a dynamic hackathon that encourages women to leverage technology for social impact. Join us to create, connect, and contribute to a better future.

events.title: AI Ideas Challenge
events.description: AI Ideas Challenge brings together creative minds to brainstorm and pitch innovative AI solutions. Present your ideas to industry experts and win exciting prizes.

events.title: Future Tech Talks
events.description: Future Tech Talks features inspiring speakers from the tech industry sharing insights on emerging technologies, career growth, and the future of innovation.

events.title: Innovation Sprint
events.description: Innovation Sprint is an intensive ideation session where participants develop creative solutions to real-world challenges in just 48 hours.

events.title: Women in AI Summit
events.description: Women in AI Summit brings together leaders, researchers, and practitioners to discuss the impact of women in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

events.title: Code for Change
events.description: Code for Change is a 48-hour hackathon where developers create solutions addressing social challenges. Build impactful projects and win prizes.

events.title: Deep Tech Dialogues
events.description: Deep Tech Dialogues brings together experts to discuss cutting-edge technologies like quantum computing, biotech, and advanced materials.

events.title: Startup Pitch Day
events.description: Startup Pitch Day gives aspiring entrepreneurs the chance to present their ideas to investors and mentors. Get feedback and funding opportunities.
